lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: I know how much of a difference it make when someone believes in you.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct research into leadership and entrepreneurship at Swansea University in Wales

lender.name: Ainsley
lender.loan_because: I know that no matter how old or young we may be, we can always make a difference.

lender.name: The Shannon Family
lender.loan_because: It's cool to see people make good use of the money that we can spare

lender.name: Nigel
lender.occupation: consultant in social housing & social care

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people increase their quality of life and to create sustainable jobs / goods / services.

lender.name: Michael & Janice
lender.loan_because: We want to encourage entreprenerial efforts and self sufficiency
lender.occupational_info: Full time explorers

lender.name: Alan
lender.occupational_info: I install and repair computer systems that record telephone calls in call centres and other offices.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate the movement of soldiers into Iraq and Afghanistan.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: Equality of opportunity is very important to building strong communities. Lending through Kiva gives that opportunity to build businesses and improve lives to people who might otherwise not have the chance.

lender.name: tarvid
lender.loan_because: I like to see things work
lender.occupational_info: help people use the Internet

lender.name: Wai and Lei
lender.loan_because: We totally support the view of helping growth so that people have the power to trade as a long term solution to much of world poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We sell building energy logbooks and energy diagnostics software.

lender.name: Ruby
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people in Developing Countries the opportunity to work their way out of poverty.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because:
Being from Africa I can empathise with the plight and hardships in trying to make a living running a small business.
Living in the UK contrasts this even more-so when I look at our earnings and compare them to the less priveledged. We waste so much more than we need in the west, so I've decided to help out with small loans of amounts that could otherwise so easily go to frivilous waste. As individuals we can't save the world but we can still make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Software related

lender.name: Imsradio
lender.loan_because: I like to help hard working people to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Supplier of quality unsigned music to businesses in the UK

lender.name: claire
lender.loan_because: I saw this site on BBC news 24 - I wanted to give something back and this seemed like a real "hands on" way to do it

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower individuals to a better quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Math teacher in a high school with about 600 students from 58 different cultures. A lot of these students have come to Perth as refugees from various parts of Africa and the Middle East.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I've allways been interested in the working of microfinanced businesses. Kiva makes it possible to do so in an easy way.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's awesome to see how we can all come together to help someone succeed.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves build something that they can take real pride in.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for a company that makes electronic whiteboards for schools.

lender.name: Raja
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of micro-financing to change lives.
lender.occupational_info: Fundraising.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am second in command of the largest and most beautiful cruise ship in the world.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to work with individuals who can create business solutions to meet need and love the way my giving goes on going round.
lender.occupational_info: I work with activists in South London to tackle injustice and improve the life for the most oppressed.

lender.name: Denis & Ervina
lender.loan_because: We would like to help someone improve their life.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: it feels good

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: The best way for poor people to lift themselves out of poverty is for them to make their own decisions. The best way for richer people like me is to help them do that, not to tall them what to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach linguistics in a university in Singapore. Linguistics is the study of language and how it works; how we learn it, how we use it, and how we adapt it to a changing world. In linguistics we don't study a few specific languages; we study all languages because language is an ability shared by all humans. That also makes me interested in how all humans live, and in particular how they solve their daily problems, including getting out of poverty through hard work and intelligent investment.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: If you are able to help, there is no reason not to.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: It bothers me that people in other countries have so many problems just surviving. It should bother everyone. Kiva makes it possible for anyone & everyone to help those people in a small way that, as numbers grow, can help them in a bigger way
lender.occupational_info: I run a small car rental business.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can, and it's important to help when we can. We can make a difference.

lender.name: Jacob Laurvigen
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I am happy to be able to help fellow entrepreneurs around the world in need of a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: http://www.xylemventure.com

lender.name: Philippa
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to have the money to be able to help other people

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I loan through Kiva because it is an opportunity for one person to help another person directly anywhere in the world. I reloan because the same money works again and again and again.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I don't have a lot of extra money, so when I give I want to make sure that the money is used for opportunities that can provide freedom. I feel connected by reading the stories and journals, and I find it inspirational to my own life that these people with such hardships can have faith and persevere.
lender.occupational_info: I work arranging employment interviews between hiring employers and university students.

lender.name: Mama Ayadi Salma
lender.loan_because: *important to be globally responsible *teach our children the value of money *make capital available to poor people
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of children (5 - 11 years old) from Lawton Elementary School in Seattle, USA, and their parents and teachers. Our classes study one country at a time and lend to entrepreneurs in the country the class is studying.

lender.name: Mikael
lender.loan_because: I loan simply because I believe this idea is great, I'm really looking forward to be able to make a small difference for someone.
lender.occupational_info: I work mainly as an IT consultant, as a partner in my company I also have other responsibilities (economics and some administration).

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can. I want to do what I can to make the world a better place. We all need help now and then.
lender.occupational_info: My 'real' work is raising my children and ensuring that they too do all they can to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Evil Edna
lender.loan_because: A charity handout doesn't help in the longrun - Kiva is a great way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Giada
lender.loan_because: because I can go without sweets for a month.
lender.occupational_info: Professional smiley kid who loves animals and people.

lender.name: Jake
lender.occupational_info: I start new businesses.

lender.name: Supun
lender.loan_because: I don't like the idea of interest and how it's used as a tool to widen the gap between rich and poor. I think micro lending is a practical way of helping someone make a difference in their community and get into the "global marketplace". Hopefully their good work will ripple some good vibes my way too
lender.occupational_info: I lead a very sedantry life and I don't really get a chance to know people in the society I live. I try to make connections and I learned a lot through charitable service. I hate how money works as debt. I would love for all of the banks to go out of business but it seems we all fear what might happen if we remove that stress.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Menno
lender.loan_because: We can complain all we want about legal and illegal immigration and economic migration, if we don't bring employment to people where they live, they will keep coming to where the grass is greener.
lender.occupational_info: A Dutch native living in the United States, I have spent the past 25 years at the forefront of corporate Internet development, and have recently taken a step back to see what else I can add to the world around me, and have fun doing it.

lender.name: Adedeji
lender.loan_because: The Lord says whatever you do to the least of my brothers, you do onto me.
lender.occupational_info: Simply helpful.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It is a brilliant idea and will directly benefit those people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: Financial services in a compliance function.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Micro-credit is changing the world - and it's great to be a (small) part of that
lender.occupational_info: I make sure Banks do the right things

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: I spend more time and money on (Kath,the dog in the photo.)than some of these people earn in 5 years.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who want to help themselves.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: This is the best way to help real people around the world. Kiva donors help working people improve their lives and communities in ways that make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a health district which owns lands and buildings. Assets include a skilled nursing center for the aged, a physicians clinic for the poor and an office building for medical providers. We serve several small rural communities on the Pacific Ocean Coast in North America.

lender.name: ron
lender.loan_because: I have worked with a large Philippine microcredit organization, and really appreciated their dedication, and their results. Kiva is a new way to provide additional capital into the microcredit system, and I support their aims totally.
lender.occupational_info: I

lender.name: Andrew and His Parents
lender.loan_because: it empowers people and blesses us at the same time.
lender.occupational_info: We train university students in leadership skills as well as serve in Christian ministry.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Help those who are looking to help themselves.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I'm very lucky, being able to work in the field of entertainment as a magician. I get paid for something as frivolous as a trick with a deck of cards and spend my working time surrounded by happy, smiling people. Having discovered Kiva I realised I'd found a way to put a smile on someones face that doesn't have as easy a life as me.
lender.occupational_info: I entertain people as a close-up magician, at weddings, parties and corporate events. I also run an online directory.

lender.name: D & K
lender.loan_because: it's a way to make a difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: Anne O Gang
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people and change there lifes for the better :)
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital in a department for patients with haematological dieseases.

lender.name: Renada
lender.loan_because: $25 can make all of the difference!

lender.name: Nils
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student of high voltage transmission systems and power electronics.

lender.name: Kersti Anear
lender.loan_because: We have so much in our lives and we are so very very lucky that we need to give some back to those who need help.
lender.occupational_info: InTatters.com is an online website for Tatters, crocheters and knitters as well as other crafts.

lender.name: Montserrat
lender.loan_because: Because this is an excellent way to help women get established and become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I make candles, and also journals, and greeting cards with my paintings.

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: it's a small thing I can do to help.
lender.occupational_info: I write scripts for television shows.

lender.name: The Smiths
lender.loan_because: we know which side our bread is buttered on!

lender.name: Emad
lender.loan_because: A great way to help people in need.

lender.name: Erick
lender.loan_because: it's fun and I enjoy being able to play a small part in providing others with something that's allowed me to go to school and make plans for housing and the future: affordable credit.
lender.occupational_info: PhD student and researcher

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Time to give back...
lender.occupational_info: Spreading joy via the balance sheet

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: spread it around...Golden Rule
lender.occupational_info: Study lung disease

lender.name: Johann
lender.loan_because: I had an amazing childhood in Africa and with a family of my own now I have been inspired to do what we can to help. Kiva is a very powerful way to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Internet Entrepreneur

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I am able to help, also I especially like what Kiva is providing here in that I can see exactly who I am helping and why they need it, which gives me more confidence I am able to do good by providing funds in this way.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: it's a small amount to make such a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with organisations of all sizes to help them run their businesses more effectively, mostly through training their managers in project and people skills.

lender.name: Tristan
lender.occupational_info: I study how the brain understands language.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: My husband and I have a very comfortable life here in Chicago. I am a breast, skin and ovarian cancer survivor. I love to travel and have met many wonderful people in this world. We are on a very small, wonderful planet, the only inhabited so we should love one another and spread peace and wealth for good things not bad. The western way of life is not necessary the best. Make everyones "home" a place of peace, prosperity and free.
lender.occupational_info: I usually am at home. I do try to go to my old job at a family owned, small jewelry store near my home to assist customers and help with paper work and most importantly be out with people. No life is whole without others.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: Nothing gives me more pleasure than helping those wanting to help themselves. If I can make one person's life better by giving a meer $25! WOW!Nothing could feel better than that!
lender.occupational_info: I've got the best job in the world if you ask me. Mainly I help people buying or selling homes by making it as easy as possible. It can be a stressful time, so my husband & I do the best we can to make it fun. We live in an incredible area of Canada so a good portion of the people moving here come from all over the world which makes it all the more fun for us too. Now that's what I call Win/Win

lender.name: Gladys
lender.whereabouts: Le Gosier Guadeloupe, French West Indies
lender.loan_because: I live in a french west indies island...

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: A few of my friends have sniped at my invites saying micro-finance is just micro-capitalism. I think, hey better to do something than do nothing... I'll put my $25 where my mouth is!
lender.occupational_info:
I get paid to give information, advice and help to anyone about anything... as long as it's to do with drugs, alcohol or sexual health.
For networking i'm on facebook, don't really use myspace nowadays, look me up- mhrooney@yahoo.com.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of microlending.
lender.occupational_info: I help patients in my community.

lender.name: Bohdan
lender.loan_because: it's important to help others less fortunate achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Ochuko
lender.loan_because: It's my widow's mite and I believe it'll affect lives positively and put smiles on faces.:)
lender.occupational_info:
My main job involves me working with ATMs(these are machines that pay you money when you go to the bank or shopping malls instead of human tellers/cashiers).
My other job involves me making images(taking pictures) with a camera. I do this as a hobby and for money too.
I also help hospitals in developing countries to harness the potentials of IT in improving healthcare delivery, reducing cost and improving the overall well-being of the people.

lender.name: joanne
lender.loan_because: My immigrant grandfather, who was blind and had no money, started a little store to try to help his family. I wish these entrepreneurs the best.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: Once upon a time there was a wise man who used to go to the ocean to do his writing. He had a habit of walking on the beach before he began his work. One day he was walking along the shore. As he looked down the beach, he saw a human figure moving like a dancer. He smiled to himself to think of someone who would dance to the day. So he began to walk faster to catch up. As he got closer, he saw that it was a young man and the young man wasn't dancing, but instead he was reaching down to the shore, picking up something and very gently throwing it into the ocean. As he got closer he called out,"Good morning! What are you doing?" The young man paused, looked up and replied, "Throwing starfish in the ocean." "I guess I should have asked, why are you throwing starfish in the ocean?" "The sun is up and the tide is going out. And if I don't throw them in they'll die." "But, young man, don't you realize that there are miles and miles of beach and starfish all along it. You can't possibly make a difference!" The young man listened politely. Then bent down, picked up another starfish and threw it into the sea, past the breaking waves and said, "It made a difference for that one."

lender.name: Johane
lender.loan_because: I believe in partnering with my neighbors.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a non-profit agency.

lender.name: Lucas
lender.loan_because: I feel satisfied when I make differences

lender.name: Ji-Young
lender.loan_because: I believe in people having opportunities. I have seen it work. Small loan could mean trust that we have in people's potential and creativity - made in His likeness.
lender.occupational_info: I love to share the vision, provide training for holistic mission and give seminars to various groups.

lender.name: Tonya
lender.loan_because: This was a Birthday gift from my son and his wife.But I will continue. Luke6:35,36
lender.occupational_info: No longer work outside the home.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I would like to give a helping hand to someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: Offering assistance to those in great need.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: We need to share our resources with one another because we are all one.
lender.occupational_info: I help restaurants in the U.S. get more business.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: All people on this planet are God's children. I want to help my brothers and sisters utilize their God given talents to help themselves, their families and their local communities.
lender.occupational_info: My work is a mixture of offering my talents with others in a hot and dirty environment.

lender.name: Emily Okerlund
lender.loan_because: I love to help others. It brings me the greatest happiness to see that I have made a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a fifteen year old high school student. I hope to someday become an English teacher so that I can be an inspiration to people who need it.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I really want the recipient entrepeneurs to be successful and independent.
lender.occupational_info: my work is not my passion. It allows me to do other things in life which I'm passionate about. I feel strongly aobut caring for the environment, animal welfare and social justice.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: it is a small solution to end poverty in our global capital economy.

lender.name: MalindaCraigAdena
lender.loan_because: Let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth. 1 John 3:18 For God so loved the world that he gave his only son so that whoever believes in him shall have eternal life. John 3:16
lender.occupational_info: Mother and eyecare. Father and woodworker.

lender.name: Kyrie
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.

lender.name: Layla
lender.loan_because: I can afford it and I would like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I live in Alaska, near the Arctic Circle, where I work as a layout artist for my town's newspaper. I also draw and paint, and I'm writing a novel.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: Meh.
lender.occupational_info: I build the oil pads that fuel America.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: It's the most dignified way to help, and if I were starting a business, I'd want some help, too.
lender.occupational_info: I study the way people talk and what their accent conveys about who they are.

lender.name: Eduardo
lender.loan_because: I care about people.
lender.occupational_info: Student and self employed home maintenance worker. I'm from Mexico.

lender.name: Canadian entreprenuer
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself and truly feel that this is the best way to end a lot of evil in this world
lender.occupational_info: Help other become successful

lender.name: Michael & Susan
lender.loan_because: we should
lender.occupational_info: Developing Scientific tools to discover the cause and help cure Genetic disease

lender.name: Kemal
lender.loan_because: To help others achieve their goals.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are willing to help themselves. Hardwork and long hours have helped me achieve financial security. Hopefully this loan will lead others to achieve thier goals.

lender.name: Diane & Jim
lender.loan_because: We want to return some of the many blessings we've received in our lives.
lender.occupational_info: Jim works with radios and electronics for the Canadian government. Diane works part time as an editor and also does volunteer work with Victoria hospice.

lender.name: Mounir
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of empowering hard-working individuals in poor countries to build successful businesses.

lender.name: Ivan, Emily & Liam
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a jump start.
lender.occupational_info: Ivan manages both the sale and purchase of Real Estate. Emily acts as negotiator for large corporations. Liam eats all things yellow.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help but I don't trust the big charities to use my money well. I also think it is better to lend than to give. If you lend you encourage hard work and enterprise, if you give you could just encourage dependency.

lender.name: james
lender.loan_because: I love to help.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Freely ye have received, freely give...
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a primary school in Australia.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I am happy to get the opportunity to help people who are working to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make decisions about insuring people against something happening to their homes, like flood or fire.

lender.name: amber
lender.loan_because: my friend Cathy continues to inspire me...
lender.occupational_info: currently interpret fur trade history, have worked in a nursing home for years and also as a fish monger

lender.name: Clive
lender.loan_because: I feel its a brilliant idea and it gives me a great feeling that Im helping someone less privaliged than me
lender.occupational_info: Semi retired

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving the opportunity of a better life to those less fortunate.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I believe that the only way to eradicate poverty is to help communities to help themselves. Helping businesses to grow hopefully has a knock on effect in the community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a self employed bookkeeper and tax agent. I work from home where I have a dedicated office. My clients are mostly small business men and women and I take care of their bookkeeping and tax affairs. Other clients need help to complete tax returns, and I deal with their tax affairs also.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: God and Jesus has made a change in my live, for the better. Turning my like around, I think, so I could help others. Now it is time to give back the love they have given me.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a c.n.c. machinist/progamer, and on the weekend I help others that I find as a Reverend.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: To help others realize their dreams

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: A small loan can make a huge difference to someone's life, allowing them the chance to pull themselves out of poverty

lender.name: S. M. Husain
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others in need, so that they can be self-sustainable and provide for their children's better future! I Hope ‚ÄúYou can loan too to make a difference‚Äù!!!
lender.occupational_info:
Working around the World as Humanitarian Relief Worker. Have lived and worked in Azerbaijan and Tajikistan plus nine other countries of Asia, Africa and the Middle East. I like outdoors & fishing and watch my daughter doing equestrian sport.
I have recently completed my assignment with UNDP in Juba, Southern Sudan and currently residing temporarily in Amman, Jordan.
Check out the following website for Horse Riding at Arabian Horse Club in Amman, Jordan

lender.loan_because: every human could other human

lender.name: Wendi
lender.loan_because: it's a small step I can take which I hope can produce big outcomes.

lender.name: Forrest Family
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. It is a good thing to do. It is THE thing to do.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I wish to help.
lender.occupational_info: I assess business contracts, draft contracts, and ensure that contracts perform the required function without unnecessary risk. I also advise on intellectual property issues in biotechnological research, particularly in the agricultural sector.

lender.name: LISA
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than we are. I have my own business and it was hard for me to start up so I really admire the people less fortunate that try to make a better lives for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own catering business in the UK

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers in a university

lender.name: Ian Kelly
lender.loan_because: It's rude not to!!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my business and want to put something back.

lender.name: SERAFIN
lender.loan_because: I need to raise enough operating capital to open a Restaurant at the center of our town to have maximum access to more buyers of our food product, which is called "LOMI-Batangas".
lender.occupational_info: I am a sole proprietor, of Lomi-Batangas outlet in our home for almost 1 year. I am open to teach the "technology" on how to cook this Chinese cuisine. The Canton noodle is home-made and cannot be bought in the market that is why it is not salty. The sauce is sticky using flour, and it is shining like gold after cooking. The toppings are bologna, pork liver, pork meat or kikiam. Soy sauce, garlic-chili sauce and calamansi/lemon are added to improve its taste. Almost 95% of our customers are coming back to eat and taste again this instant noodle. I hope I can demonstrate how to cook this food to other aspiring Entrepreneurs to help them introduce new product in their domestic market.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Helping others to help themselves & others just feels great

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: the world needs more debt
lender.occupational_info: taking peoples money

lender.name: African Ice
lender.loan_because: This is what we do!
lender.occupational_info: African Ice - A delicious way to save the world!!

lender.name: Ronski
lender.loan_because: This has to be the only form of charity where the middle man doesn't benefit!
lender.occupational_info: Turn it off and turn it back on! Yes, I am a Windows Support Tech! lol

lender.name: Ciara
lender.loan_because:
I want to help improve people's lives in the developing world. Everybody needs a helping hand from time to time. I think that this is a fantastic idea. It's amazing to be able to help individuals on the other side of the world get their businesses up and running.
There are so many people in the developed world that feel they can't make a difference. This site makes a difference and reaches out to people directly! I'm grateful to Kiva for the opportunity to do this and I'm going to recommend Kiva to everyone I know.
lender.occupational_info: I design brochures, posters and ads.

lender.name: martyn
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: Quite interesting. We make equipment mainly for the pharmaceutical industry.

lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: vincent
lender.loan_because: I really need to start my own computer business.I have alot of experience in the repairs of computers and need to start my own business.
lender.occupational_info: I am very hardworking and result oriented person.When given the opportunity I will change the lives of many people.I work very tirelessly.I must say I am a workaholic

lender.occupational_info: I help others become successful at what they do.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I have a bit of spare money which, through Kiva, can be used by people who need it more than I do

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because:
I feel there are many people in foreign countries who are not given the help needed to support themselves and their families through setting up their own businesses.
Also I believe people who make an effort deserve help to further their opportunities.
lender.occupational_info:
I work in an office with a varied group of people.
I check paper work and share the job with two other people.
My job involves:
filing checking paper work printing and sending paper work sending out tickets, etc

lender.name: shittu monsuru
lender.loan_because: i need money to pay for my pr-degree science programme application fee.
lender.occupational_info: i am a student,propounding to further his education

lender.name: Sheelagh
lender.loan_because: A small amount can make a huge difference. Its good to know you can help people directly in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people here in the UK who have been injured through accidents or medical negligence.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Wim
lender.loan_because: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

lender.name: Bernard
lender.loan_because: I believe in capitalism and entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: Research and development of sporting goods.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Like my cat I have a relatively comfortable life. Lending to microprojects like these is, I hope. a very effective way to help those with less fat pet cats.
lender.occupational_info: I teach economics, so, hopefully, this is putting practice into theory

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: Very disillusioned with charities that extract most of the donations in admin. costs. This is a way of giving something back in a way that will directly benefit peoples lives. The idea of helping people to help themselves is an excellent idea, might even visit somebody I loaned to on a holiday sometime, to say hello.
lender.occupational_info: Submariner

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to make a real impact.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: why not?
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who is currently studying philosophy and music.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good

lender.name: Hovander
lender.loan_because: My son & I believe that every dime helps. Put together enough dimes and you have a dollar.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: My life has been greatly blessed. I am honored that God has given me the means to pass that blessing on to others.
lender.occupational_info: I look at business needs in our company, and put together plans and budgets to meet those needs.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: It takes such a small amount to make a big difference. This is more important than buying something for myself that I might want but dont actually need.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky to have such a good life and feel like I should do what ever I can to help others live one too.
lender.occupational_info: Fix things

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: [Insert random altruistic comment]

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: It's good to be able to help
lender.occupational_info: I help business and educators use social media and virtual worlds

lender.name: Toby
lender.loan_because: It achieves more than putting it in an ISA, savings account, etc.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I hope that in my own small way I can help others in this world to live more comfortable lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company find buildings to buy in the Manhattan real estate market. I do research and write brochures and speeches for my boss and keep everything running smoothly and professionally.

lender.name: STEFAN
lender.loan_because: i enjoy helping people out
lender.occupational_info: it pays the bills

lender.name: The Le Chevalliers
lender.loan_because: To help empower women throughout the world. So that no woman has to make the choice to give up her child due to poverty.

lender.name: Thomas and Naomi
lender.loan_because: Because if I needed money I would hope that someone else would give me this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Thomas works as a freelance musician in England. Naomi teaches teenage children science.

lender.name: Rebekah
lender.loan_because: I like to help entrepreneurs achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Durk
lender.loan_because: I feel that the revenues (in the broadest sense of the word) of micro loans are higher then any donated interest.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a good reason not to.
lender.occupational_info: I build prosthetic legs for amputees who lose their legs through injury or disease.

lender.name: Damion
lender.loan_because: I Lend Because i was once in a situation where i wanted monmey and a kind person lend me some money.
lender.occupational_info: Challengeing

lender.name: Sharyn
lender.loan_because: I realize how lucky and comfortable I am.
lender.occupational_info: I bring books, music, movies, and information together with the people that need it.

lender.name: Belinda
lender.loan_because: I know it is hard to start your own business and if I to help someone else reach their goals and dreams, then that makes me smile.
lender.occupational_info: I make ergonomic massage tools that give a massage like no other. It helps people with chronic pain and stress. It is a phenomenal feeling to make something that helps people feel better!

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: ‚ÄúSeen or not, we each live in a world the size of our own understandings, inhabited by the creatures our consciousness permits, and governed by the contents of our heart. This explains why the wise are happy and the ignorant so often suffer. Learning to be wise is to choose a life free from suffering.‚Äù Buddha
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: Golden Rule- Do unto others, as you would have them do unto you. We in the "1st world/developed" countries have so much more than ever before, in history . . . we can do without, for the betterment of humanity.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by reading Muhammad Yunus' Banker to the Poor.

lender.name: JPT
lender.loan_because: I want to follow in the example of my parents. They still do their own form of micorlending to customers, employees and former employees with no interest charged.
lender.occupational_info: I plan and organize work for a large health care organization.

lender.name: jonathan
lender.loan_because: i want to make a huge profit and spend it on chocolate cake. Ok, not really.
lender.occupational_info: medical student

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I want people to have more opportunities to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for myself as a small business. I design and write computer programs for other businesses.

lender.name: Jude
lender.loan_because: I believe in lending a hand.

lender.name: Yao Wen
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer technician work at IKON. www.ikon.com is my company. Nice to meet you.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I know what a difference it makes to give someone a chance at independence and success. I love this Kiva program and tell all my friends about it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 9 to 5 girl, but I'm blessed in that I can pay my bills and live in relative freedom and peace. I hope to give other people a chance for the same.

lender.name: Monika
lender.loan_because: I am so thankful for everything that I have been blessed with and I want to share those blessing with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a freely available to the public scientific resource, the Mouse Genome Database. This database contains a wealth of information for scientists on mouse research. I am also working on a Masters in Public Health degree.

lender.name: Deanne
lender.loan_because: We in the West are so privileged.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English Language and Literature to students aged 11-18.

lender.name: marco
lender.loan_because: penso che quello che questo sito e il premio nobel facciano sia esportare democrazia in tutto il mondo,la democrazia secondo me √® dare le stesse possibilit√† a tutti ,indipendentemente da ogni altra considerazione,per me il potere dare anche solo una possibilit√† a chi ha una idea,una iniziativa √® un segnale di ottimismo nei confronti dell'uomo e della sua voglia di riscatto

lender.name: Maryam
lender.loan_because: I like see dreams come true.

lender.name: Dennis & Hilary
lender.occupational_info:
I am employed by local government to work with children in a residential unit in Inverness - a great job, but somewhat stressful at times.
I also work as a volunteer for a children's charity called Chernobyl Children Life Line. We fund and invite children from Belarus to visit the Scottish Highlands. They all come from areas contaminated by the fallout from the Chernobyl nuclear power station disaster of 1986. The children stay in the Highlands for one month to improve their health and experience lots of fun - great children!
Chernobyl Children Life Line website is: www.chernobyl-childrens-charity.co.uk
Please take a look - there are some excellent photos on the 'media' page.

lender.name: Mike Hart
lender.loan_because: Starting my own business was hard, but it is nothing compared to the astonishing stories I have been reading here. Looking through kiva.org makes me realise how lucky I really was, and how I can help others facing far harder problems (and with none of the resources I had) by sacrificing just a few percent interest, and accepting a small risk.
lender.occupational_info: Based in England, I sell computer cables and accessories to UK and European customers.

lender.name: The Donah Family
lender.loan_because:
We want to help provide better options to those who are working hard to better their lives and have a positive impact in their communities. Our loans also express our gratitude to God for providing for us and as an expression of our faith.
We are also outraged because we know there are those who exploit others in developing communities by charging unfair interest rates and unethical loan practices. We want to help provide better options!
We challenge others to join with us
lender.occupational_info: Wife is a manager at the non-profit YMCA. Husband is a mover (moves furniture and goods for businesses and households).

lender.name: Erick
lender.loan_because: it's better than not loaning.

lender.name: Bette (Mary W.)
lender.loan_because: God and I made a bargin. God came through for me, so now it's my pleasure to come through for others.
lender.occupational_info: As a retired person, I'm free to work on behalf of the marginal people crossing our borders.

lender.name: Deon
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs to try and heal the world by providing wealth to all. Remember we are all one.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an oil field engineer in the province of Alberta in Canada in what we call the oil patch.

lender.name: Sanity
lender.loan_because: I got where I am today because people invested in me, so I would like to invest in others.
lender.occupational_info: I run a company that is building a website which will help people find news and information of interest to them.

lender.name: Wolfgang and Coree
lender.loan_because: ... it would be irresponsible not to! We are grateful for our good health, careers and home. We are VERY fortunate compared to some of our neighbors in the world and we want to make a positive difference in their lives. We wish all loan recipients Success and Good Fortune!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: dawa
lender.loan_because: I want to invest my money and at the same time,I want to use the money those who really needs..
lender.occupational_info: enthusiastic

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Because I think it's cool to have a connection with someone in another country.
lender.occupational_info: I am a media relations person -- in Commonwealth countries, I'd be called a press officer. I work for a major university.

lender.name: Celeste
lender.loan_because: My son gave me a Kiva gift certificate and I am continuing to reloan. I love helping others.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: It's great to see people trying to rise above poverty to help themselves and their communities.

lender.name: marie-patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have a better future.

lender.name: storyofstone
lender.loan_because: I can make a small difference in this world to help someone who is in need.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy books, music, films, and travel.

lender.name: elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help another entrepreneur find the resources they need.

lender.name: Ninya
lender.loan_because: This is a brilliant way to make a positive contribution toward enhancing life for others in harder circumstances than my own. I hope my small loans, combined with those of others, will help people in developing nations become financially secure and happy.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct research in fields of tobacco control and food marketing, to help reduce the harms caused by smoking tobacco and unhealthy diets.

lender.name: Wendy & Tom
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to learn about other cultures and make a difference in a personal way.
lender.occupational_info: Wendy: Business Change & Project Management Consultant- Helping organizations plan for and implement change. Tom: ESPN - Database support and subject matter expert for X Games and 2010 World Cup Soccer in South Africa.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I am interested in giving back to humanity.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses navigate government regulations.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.occupational_info: We are a ranch family and raise Angus, Hereford, and Registered Longhorn cattle in Oklahoma on the Cimarron River.

lender.name: St. Andrews Students
lender.loan_because: Our English teacher gave us $20 seed money and told us we should find a way to make a difference in the world with this money. We could add to the amount but only if we earned the money. Between the five us us we made an extra $30. We decided to invest this money with Kiva and it's clients. We will continue to reinvest our money for other clients of Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: School Project to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: People have helped me get to where I am today. Why not return a favor to someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I works as a Network Administrator for a school district in Colorado.

lender.name: Chris & Cath
lender.loan_because: We both love the idea of being able to help someone who is less fortunate than ourselves.

lender.name: Sumita and Vipul
lender.loan_because: this is, by far, the only proven and sustainable way to wage war on poverty. It also allows loan recipients to stand on their own feet without the indignity of depending on a handout.
lender.occupational_info: Sumita is a software engineer and works a lot with computers. Vipul is also an engineer but works in marketing (because he used to be a really lousy engineer) :)

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserve a chance to create their own solutions.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: small business helps to make the world go 'round.
lender.occupational_info: I design and hand make silver jewelry.

lender.loan_because: I believe this is a great cause!

lender.occupation: We work in the Senior Housing industry

lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I operate heavy machinery in a winter ski resort in the mountains of Canada and I write.

lender.name: David & Sonja
lender.loan_because: We have been fortunate in life and give because we are able and think that bypassing bureaucracies is a sensible way to proceed.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in the mental health field all my life. Sonja was a handicapped learner specialist.

lender.name: Nurul Alam
lender.loan_because: I do business of garments & doing this i need money.So interested person can give me a loan
lender.occupational_info: I buy stock of garments & export them worlwide.When a buyer asked for a product then i want to buy those for my buyer & export those products, but i have no money but have buyer,For this reason i need money

lender.name: kat & anirban
lender.loan_because: That's what our inner voice tells us to.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer networks.

lender.name: David 1
lender.loan_because: I travel and appreciate how lucky we are. KIVA lets us assist the less fortunate in the world, not by handouts, but by giving them a chance to progress. It is not for me, anyone else, or nation, to dictate how another society should be run. However an independant loan, to an individual, will allow that individual to have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Making the2012 olympics safe

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I think that this a really good idea - small businesses often only need small amounts to thrive. Bypassing the banks will force them to change in the longer term.
lender.occupational_info: Serial Entrepreneur; Consultant

lender.name: Jeffrey Henderson
lender.loan_because: If we wait around for governments then it will be a long time. They do what they can, but together we can all do what we can. Kiva helps those who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business who also teaches university studies.

lender.name: Bruno
lender.loan_because: "One day our grandchildren will go to museums to see what poverty was like" (Muhammad Yunus, The Independent, 1996)

lender.name: Fran√ßoise
lender.loan_because: it's a pleasure to help people who work hard and to participate in their endeavour to have a better life.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I think economic self-sufficiency is the quickest way to world peace.

lender.name: David

lender.name: Dariusz

lender.loan_because: being nice does not hurt anyone!
lender.occupational_info: We own and operate an organic shop. We sell all natural products - no pesticide, herbicide or other harmfull chemical ingredients.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together, and it's important we all help each other to make a better, fairer society.
lender.occupational_info: I teach university students.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Loaning for good causes is a step towards sustainability.
lender.occupational_info: I work every day with people on concepts, projects, ideas and dreams and I make sure to offer guidance to the best of my capacities.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.loan_because: I can

lender.occupational_info: Its interesting to be a small entrepreneurship.

lender.loan_because: I LIKE TO HELP PEOPLE
lender.occupational_info: HOUSE WIFE

lender.loan_because: I want to help people reach their goals and help my daughter understand her responsibilities to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a U.S. diplomat and my daughter is a six year old student.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: i like to help people

lender.name: neil
lender.loan_because: because i want to continue my small business.i raise pigs and goats and when they are big enough i sell them in the market
lender.occupational_info: un ordinary employee in the goverment.living in my country is so hard with out any extra income.im a utility worker and its hard for me to save money coz i also pay loans and othe expenditure

lender.name: barry
lender.loan_because: I buy and sell all the time and know how many problems you can encounter when setting up in buisness. I would now like to take this chance and help people and give them the chance that they deserve to get their own buisness up and running.
lender.occupational_info: I guess i am lucky enough to have a full time job and on the side have a small part time job as well, however the time has now come for me to give a little back to the people who really need a chance and hopefully i can make a difference to their lives.

lender.name: luca
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I insure mortgages for banks Independent Title Closer and I also Provide Homeowners with certified copies of their property deeds nationwide.

lender.name: JPC
lender.loan_because: it helps people
lender.occupational_info: I write equations

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: My company builds computer programs for banks.

lender.name: Randy & Robin
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my own life and this one way of giving that helps grow businesses one loan at a time.

lender.name: Germain
lender.occupation: I am a software Engineer for GE Healthcare
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe we each need a little hand at some point in our lives...

lender.name: Lines Family
lender.loan_because: We love to help people all around the world. It's great to see people working to improve their lives and help their families.

lender.name: Vernon Flynn
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Emilie
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others in order to survive.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I¬¥ve understood, that from a certain level of wealth, more money does¬¥nt make you happier any more. But you can give happiness to others by helping. The western society has achieved so much wealth - now it is our obligation to give others a chance too. Kiva offers a great platform for this.
lender.occupational_info: I¬¥m a private asset manager. I¬¥m managing investments, assets, money of my clients by placing it on the swiss banking place on a fiduciary basis.

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: I think its a great way to help people!
lender.occupational_info: I am looking for creative opportunities in Brasil.

lender.name: J, B, P, O & H
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others in less fortunate circumstances.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: it is a great honor to help those who wish to pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a law firm during the day and in the evenings I dye wool, spin yarn, and weave.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to support a program, where the goal is to help people who are willing to work their way out of poverty.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.occupation: Mom of Twins & Martial Arts School Owner
lender.loan_because: There are so many ways to help others in this world and most of us simply do not. We need to give in order to receive! If every celebrity in Hollywood or NY would stop and give a little of themselves instead of buying a $200 pair of jeans or a $3000 handbag we wouldn't have as much poverty as we do in the world today. I am a small business owner myself and know how hard it is to make it each month. I want to give because that is what we are meant to do.
lender.occupational_info: My husband Louis and I own a martial arts school. We teach adults and children how to defend themselves physically but also try to give them skills that they will need to develop as a person. Teaching respect for themselves and others, teaching self control, weight management, boosting their self confidence. Teaching them most importantly, we think, how to become a great Leader.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I feel so lucky to live in an area where I don't have to worry about basic necessities. I want to help other people feel safe and raise their families successfully to contribute to a better world community.
lender.occupational_info: I help women empower themselves by teaching them to listen to their bodies, enrich their relationships and even start their own businesses.

lender.name: Francis
lender.loan_because: I am living such a privileged life because of my parents‚Äô hard-work and care. I want to help create opportunities so all children can grow up with similar privileges and have the ability to access education.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: "we must be the change we want to see in the world" ~Mahatma Gandhi~

lender.name: Typozay.co.uk
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lamont
lender.loan_because: They need the liquidity
lender.occupational_info: I make thousands of computers work correctly.

lender.name: Rhys
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people help themselves. People have helped me along my travels and I think it's great to be able to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small company that creates audio equipment for museums. I spend a lot of time working on our projects, I enjoy what I do and love the excitement of coming up with new ideas.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is wonderful and helps change the lives of many pro-active but disadvantaged people.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find new homes.

lender.name: Steffen and Spiritas
lender.loan_because: We like to give people a chance to improve their lives. We help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Steffen is working in an insurance company helping to make it easier for people to get insurance. Spiritas is teaching law at an university.

lender.name: ally
lender.loan_because: I feel it is everyone's responsibility to do what they can to help others around the globe; we're all in this together. It heartens me to know that any contributions made will benefit the everyday lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a senior in college at The University of Alabama, (Alabama, USA). I'm studying Public Relations and I am working as a bartender.

lender.name: Kern
lender.loan_because: The opportunity to help others who are trying to help themselves strikes me as something that you just shouldn't pass up. I have been fortunate to have never experience poverty, want or need, as much through the circumstances of my birth as through hard work and commitment. It is nice to be able to put 100% of the money I can lend to practical use. I am grateful that my good fortune can be put to use through Kiva to help people build security for themselves and others. There is, of course, a spiritual appeal to this project as well. My faith in God encourages faith in others and a belief that we are all one family. I am glad that I have found Kiva so I can help my ‚Äúfamily‚Äù around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that specializes in software for the printing and publishing industry. I have also written a history book about the small town that I currently call home, which was published in 2006.

lender.name: Pinkie
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people in developing countries, especially Ghana.

lender.name: Carol & Bill
lender.loan_because: we believe it can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Carol works in graphics and Bill owns a design company.

lender.name: MADS from MYC4
lender.loan_because: The best way out of poverty is business
lender.occupational_info: An entrepreneur building infrastructures in the digital-, printed and physical worlds with the purpose to eradicte poverty in Africa once and for all

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I am thrilled to be able to help in a small way; my faith teaches that we all should help each other.
lender.occupational_info: The doctor records his comments about the x-ray or MRI or CT into a computer that writes it out. I listen to that recording and change the written report anywhere the computer got it wrong, checking all the facts and making sure everything is correct. Then I send the report to the patient's own doctor.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because:
I believe we can improve the world by improving one life at a time.
"In a real sense all life is inter-related. All persons are caught in an inescapable network of mutuality, tied in a single garment of destiny. Whatever affects one directly affects all indirectly. I can never be what I ought to be until you are what you ought to be, and you can never be what you ought to be until I am what I ought to be. This is the inter-related structure of reality."
~Rev. Martin Luther King, Jr.

lender.name: C√©dric
lender.loan_because: If several people can help one person in a world to make a dream come true , why hesitate ?
lender.occupational_info: I'm technician in a laboratory , I analyse some parts of pharmaceutical drugs

lender.name: Filippo
lender.loan_because: One small step for man, one giant leap for mankind
lender.occupational_info: I‚Äôm a student in Geography and History.

lender.name: Vital
lender.loan_because: I think the best way for the humanity is the share international

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering women...
lender.occupational_info: I help people align their investments with their values

lender.name: Kelcey
lender.loan_because: I cannot keep my blessings to myself.

lender.name: Kim Rene
lender.loan_because: It¬¥s a brilliant idea to sponsor local business this way! You can track the developement, and it¬¥s great to do a difference...
lender.occupational_info: I make a living out of lending money to corporate clients in Denmark.

lender.name: Guillaume
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship and micro-credits. Good luck with your business guys ...
lender.occupational_info: I work in the manufacturing division of a company making medicines.

lender.name: Siren
lender.occupation: I am a terapeut - educated preeschool teacher

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Kiva borrowers are more industrious and entrepreneurial than I'll ever be and I have an immense amount of admiration for that. So, the least I can do is get off my big fat ass and press a button to lend some money!

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people take control of their own lives and I believe in the power of the Internet to connect people and create new communities that can improve the world
lender.occupational_info: I run a non-governmental organization that works to make sure that the Internet is a tool for democracy and freedom around the world.

lender.name: kristoph
lender.loan_because: I like the ability to lend directly to a person and be able to track their progress.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies/landlords buy, sell and lease their office space.

lender.name: HLMH
lender.loan_because: People helping people makes the world a better place to live!

lender.name: Jacques and Celine
lender.loan_because: shortly after arriving in America, 36 years ago, a perfect stranger co-signed a loan for me... i am forever grateful.....she recently passed away, so my daughter Celine and i wish to help others in her memory..
lender.occupational_info: I sell collectible musical instruments from America and Europe.

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because:
In the Philippines, where my family is from, 25 dollars is my cousin's salary for the month. This is used to feed, clothe, and care for his wife and toddler. 25 dollars is my share of dinner with friends.
Money is so important. There are many people in the world who have the potential to great things, if they just have the monetary backing.
I loan because there are those out there who need this more than I. My money goes to help entrepreneurs in other countries gain a better quality of life.

lender.name: Albert & Sheila
lender.loan_because: We wish to help others to have a better life and hopefully engender goodwill amongst all peoples

lender.name: SF Crew
lender.loan_because: We are a group of friends who want to help because we care.

lender.name: Sophia
lender.loan_because: I feel its great to help OTHER people!

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: To show that even a small amount may have some sort of impact, someone who works an average job can help. The money means more to them then I will ever know.
lender.occupational_info: Calculations, numbers, dealing with people with all different personalities and trying to all get along and compromise.

lender.name: Edd
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a great way to support equality in development
lender.occupational_info: I teach about sexual health

lender.name: Tobias
lender.loan_because: I would like to help. People around can do good things with the cash.
lender.occupational_info: I study plant growth. Plants are beautiful and useful. They start as tiny seeds, they take in water, they make leaves, roots, stems, flowers, with precise shapes. How do they do that? That is what I would like to know.

lender.name: Rosalyn
lender.loan_because: From those to whom much has been given, much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse for kids with cancer and blood diseases.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to want for nothing... so I'd like to share my "wealth" with others, especially with other women who are the heart and soul of a family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time Mom of three young cuties... living an exciting life in the suburbs (ha ha)

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I Can! Every little bit that each one of us can do really does make a difference! There are so many out there who are less fortunate, in terms of having enough money to fulfill their dreams... I am fortunate enough to be able to do the things that I dream about. It only makes sense to help others do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I educate children. I teach them to read, to write, to open their minds, to learn, to grow, to challenge, to dream.

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and helping others always makes me happy.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help in a tangible way and I am an entrepeneuer as well! I love that I can help someone with on the other side of the world in such a real way!
lender.occupational_info: The most rewarding job in the world! I care for my son all day and also teach him at home - he is in first grade. I do laundy, make meals, do dishes and keep the house clean. I also have my own small business selling scrapbooking supplies and I love taking pictures of my friends and family!

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I want people to have the opportunity to succeed in their ventures no matter where they may live in the world.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: Kiva lets me be a fairy godmother on a small scale. Plus I have the joy of seeing where my money goes, and watching other people succeed. Kiva makes me happy.

lender.name: C√©cile
lender.loan_because: I want to.
lender.occupational_info: I study climate and how we might predict how it changes.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: it is my obligation as a sentient being.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help people find their way through the maze of life changes: debt, marriage, family, death, taxes, government.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have an affluent life simply by luck of where I was born. Due to the imbalances of world economics, a donation that is easy for me to give makes a significant impact to someone across the world who needs it more. And the money goes direct to those who help themselves by their own enterprise, bypassing government mismanagement and corruption.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: It is a fabulous use of the power of the internet to directly make a difference in a "hands on" kind of way.
lender.occupational_info: I run a training company called Corporate Heart International which assists executives bring more heart and soul to their dealings with others.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I think people helping each other makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping make new scientific equipment

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Some folks would be happy just to have one dream come true. (....oh, and here's a hint: it's not a 72" flat screen TV)

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I believe in economic empowerment and the ability of individuals to connect across continents to enhance each other's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government in efforts to improve community health. I am especially dedicated to women's health.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to try something new
lender.occupational_info: Crunching numbers and then making decisions based on those numbers.

lender.name: Paul Ng
lender.loan_because: I believe that, in any way and any size, one should always return something back to the community/society/world that somehow directly or indirectly shaped who you are.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student studying business in Vancouver.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: working to support the microfinance industry I found a real way to help those willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I provide support to businesses utilizing information and communications technologies.

lender.name: Angus
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I research and write about individuals and entire civilizations because the story of humanity fascinates me. The lens of history allows us to understand the modern world, but only if we are honest about the past.

lender.name: donald
lender.loan_because: I believe all people deserve the opportunity to improve their situation in life. I am more than fortunate, to have been born in a nation in which dreams and ideas get to flourish without too many obstacles. If I can help someone attain their dreams, or at least help them overcome the challenges they face, then I feel like I have accomplished something real and valuable.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I believe we should all have the right to opportunity. Opportunity is the keystone to success.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Like my cat I have a relatively comfortable life. Lending amounts that are small to me but can usefully help these microprojects is, I hope, effective at helping those with less fat pet cats.
lender.occupational_info: I teach economics, so this hopefully is putting practice into theory

lender.name: Croker Cares
lender.loan_because: we care!
lender.occupational_info: We are a high school English class at an all-girls school in Nashville, Tennessee.

lender.name: Daniel&Anna
lender.loan_because: I know micro loans work. I've seen it with my own eyes and had the joy of giving out a small loan and see the business grow. God has created us to be productive and work, and sometimes we just need a little help from others to get some work.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a team of 200+ Christians who train and equip some of the poorest of the poor in the Philippines. We teach sustainable natural farming, along with personal visioning, money management and a lot of other skills including primary health education and values.

lender.name: benedict
lender.loan_because: iam very keen to go far in my recharge cards resselling business which is a thriving one over here in Nigeria
lender.occupational_info: i am the ceo of benad investments limited,a communications outfit that deals on recharge carrds of every denomination and phone accessories.i manage the business with my staff.

lender.name: kerry
lender.loan_because: i believe in independance through hard work and a bit of help to start.
lender.occupational_info: retired mother of 5 children.

lender.name: fred
lender.loan_because: I should
lender.occupational_info: retired from managing large complexes of computer systems
